synopsis.text:
Capital ize on a fresh era of Cardfighting with Chrono Shindou, an ordinary middle school student with an intimidating appearance but a gentle heart. One day, Chrono stumbles upon an enigmatic Cardfight deck, Gear Chronicle, in his locker. He ventures to the nearby Card Capital 2, where he encounters Kamui Katsuragi, who introduces him to the world of Vanguard.

Under Kamui's guidance, Chrono embarks on a thrilling journey, making friends and rivals along the way. Among them are his future teammates, Shion Kiba and Tokoha Anjou. As they bond over their shared passion for the game, Chrono and his friends strive to become the new generation of champions.

Three years after Aichi and his friends have moved on, Misaki now owns another Card Capital branch, with Kamui working part-time. Chrono, armed with his rare Gear Chronicle deck, stands up to face formidable opponents, forging new friendships and rivalries in this captivating world of strategic card battles. Join Chrono and his friends as they shape their destinies and unravel the mysteries of the 'impossible future' in this new chapter of Cardfighting.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
